#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
 int cases;
 scanf("%d",&cases);
 int n,a,b,count;
 for(int i=0;i<cases;i++)
 {
   scanf("%d",&n);
   scanf("%d",&a);
   count=0;
   for(int j=1;j<n;j++)
   {
     scanf("%d",&b);
     if(a!=b){count++;a=b;}
   }
   printf("%d\n",count);
 }
 return 0;
}
